summary: MY CAMRY HAS 30,000 MILES ON IT AND IT IS FALLING APART!  THE SCREWS HAVE FALLEN OUT OF THE DOORS THREE TIME AND THE TOYOTA DEALERSHIPS ONLY SOLUTION IS TO PUT SILICONE IN THE SCREW HOLES WHICH NOW CAUSES THE THE DOORS TO SQUEAK.  THE CAR IS DRAGGING THE GROUND AS A RESULT OF POOR STRUTS.  I CONTINUE TO GET THE RUN AROUND WITH THE MANUFACTURE.  *NLM
